mapper.select: select * from BOARD order by SEQ desc

choose.when: insert into BOARD(SEQ, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, VIEW_COUNT, WRITE_DATE) values(${seq}, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, default, sysdate)
choose.otherwise: insert into BOARD(SEQ, WRITER, TITLE, CONTENTS, VIEW_COUNT, WRITE_DATE) values(BOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{writer}, #{title}, #{contents}, default, sysdate)

mapper.update: update BOARD set TITLE=#{title}, CONTENTS=#{contents} where SEQ=${seq}
update BOARD set VIEW_COUNT=VIEW_COUNT+1 where SEQ=${seq}
